name: Maria Theresa “Trisha” Brondial Bonoan-David
positions: Member of Philippine House of Representatives from Manila's 4th district (2007–2016)
Councilor of Manila from the 4th district (1998–2007)
policies: Conversion of Calamba Street, Sampaloc into a National Road and funding for maintenance/improvement
Moratorium on LGU power to reclassify agricultural land to non-agricultural
Prohibition on importation of GMO products
Amendment to Solo Parents' Welfare Act for additional benefits and penalties
Civil penalties on unreasonable increases in crude oil, residual fuel oil, or petroleum products
Amendment to Anti-Electricity and Electric Transmission Line/Materials Pilferage Act of 1994
advocacies: Guided by Bible verse Jeremiah 29:11, focusing on creating a positive impact
Promotes livelihood, education, and housing projects for residents
